name: hy_fullstack_part3
description: University of Helsinki Full Stack Open part 3

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../HY_fullstack/osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../HY_fullstack_part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
